items.title: US and UK tell citizens in Qatar to shelter in place
items.description: Qatar's foreign affairs ministry said the advisory does "not necessarily reflect the existence of specific threats".

items.title: What we know about US strikes on three Iranian nuclear sites
items.description: The sites targeted include a uranium enrichment facility at Fordo.

items.title: Nato summit could be the most significant since end of Cold War
items.description: Europe braces for Trump's arrival at the Nato summit with difficult questions over Iran and defence, following the 5% defence spending target he's dem...

items.title: Police officers charged with murder of Kenyan blogger
items.description: Albert Ojwang died in police custody after being detained for allegedly defaming the deputy police chief.

items.title: Scottish wingsuit flyer Liam Byrne dies during Swiss Alps jump
items.description: British champion Liam Byrne, 24, had said he knew from a young age he wanted to "fly like a bird".
